name: CutThroat Island
overview: Sharpen your long sword for the ultimate high seas battle! In plundering action, uncover a treasure trove of priceless gems and gold bullion! Battle bloodthirsty pirates with knives and pistols! Chart your course through the treacherous locales, but think twice before you leave - a new world may await upon your return! And remember... dead men tell no tales on Cutthroat Island!
